ground_truth: Purpose: Scheduled maintenance check. Detailed purpose: Routine system health verification and patch updates. Server name: SAP AppSRV01. Restart time: Tomorrow at 2:00 AM. Secondary server: DatabaseServer1. Secondary reboot time: Tomorrow at 2:30 AM. Reason: Preventive maintenance. Detailed reason: To ensure optimal performance and minimize downtime.
initial_query: I need to schedule a server restart.
scenario_context:
The user needs help with scheduling a server restart for maintenance. The details they should provide when prompted:
- Purpose to restart the server: Scheduled maintenance check
- Please give the purpose of restart in details: Routine system health verification and patch updates.
- Name of server to restart: SAP AppSRV01
- Preferred time and date to restart: Tomorrow at 2:00 AM
- Server to reboot: DatabaseServer1
- Desired date and time of reboot: Tomorrow at 2:30 AM
- Reason for reboot: Preventive maintenance
- Detailed reason for reboot: To ensure optimal performance and minimize downtime for business operations.

scenario_context:
The user is experiencing internet connectivity issues. The details they should provide when prompted:
- Account number: ACC-78234-B
- Issue started: This morning around 8 AM
- Troubleshooting tried: Restarted router twice, checked all cables
- Router lights: Power is solid green, internet light is blinking red
